foreignData.name: Glühende Zangen
foreignData.text: Wenn Du während Deiner Versorgungsphase drei oder weniger Karten auf Deiner Hand hast, fügen die Glühenden Zangen einem Gegner Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

name: Scalding Tongs
originalText: During your upkeep, if you have three or fewer cards in your hand, Scalding Tongs deals 1 damage to target opponent.

rulings.text: You target one opposing player each time the ability triggers.

It checks the number of cards in your hand at the beginning of upkeep and does not trigger at all if you have more than three. It checks again on resolution and does not deal damage unless you still have 3 or fewer cards.

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have three or fewer cards in hand, Scalding Tongs deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
